text: For when the LORD goes by to strike down the Egyptians, seeing the blood on the lintel and the two doorposts, the LORD will pass over that door and not let the destroyer come into your houses to strike you down.
But make sure that you do not eat of the blood; for blood is life; you shall not eat that life with the flesh.
